summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackMoroccanoil Luminous Hairspray Medium Hold is a flexible hairspray infused with argan oil that's ideal for natural, touchable styles.
details: DetailsBenefitsFights frizz, repels humidityLeaves no flaky residueImparts a beautiful shineNon-sticky, brushable formulaKey IngredientsArgan Oil: extremely rich in tocopherols (Vitamin E), essential fatty acids and antioxidants, this natural oil helps to nourishItem 2644254How To UseHold can 10 inches (25 cm) from head and spray on dry, styled hair.Caution: EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE AEROSOL. Contents under pressure. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves, or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 50째C (122째F). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid spraying in eyes. May burst if heated. Protect from sunlight. Avoid fire, flame, and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed.IngredientsSd Alcohol 40-B (Alcohol Denat.), Hydrofluorocarbon 152-A, Aqua/Water/Eau, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Polyurethane-14, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Amp-Acrylates Copolymer, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Panthenol, Glycerin, Aminomethyl Propanol, Parfum/Fragrance, PEG-75 Lanolin, Phenyl Trimethicone, Triethyl Citrate, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Linalyl Acetate, Hexamethylindanopyran, Vanillin. MOLMUS03Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Hold can 10 inches (25 cm) from head and spray on dry, styled hair.Caution: EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE AEROSOL. Contents under pressure. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves, or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 50째C (122째F). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid spraying in eyes. May burst if heated. Protect from sunlight. Avoid fire, flame, and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: My hair dresser uses this on me when I get my hair done. Smells so good.  I can run my hands through my hair with no issues.
